[Home](./index) &gt; [@jsplumb/browser-ui](./browser-ui) &gt; [BrowserJsPlumbInstance](./browser-ui.browserjsplumbinstance)

## BrowserJsPlumbInstance class

JsPlumbInstance that renders to the DOM in a browser, and supports dragging of elements/connections.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class BrowserJsPlumbInstance extends JsPlumbInstance<ElementType> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> JsPlumbInstance&lt;[ElementType](./browser-ui.elementtype)<!-- -->&gt;

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(\_instanceIndex, defaults)](./browser-ui.browserjsplumbinstance._constructor_) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>BrowserJsPlumbInstance</code> class |
